name: get_grid_usage_statistics
description: Get the usage statistics of the Magnetic Levitation Grid for a specific city. Please note that since sensitive data is involved, this tool must be used with approvation by relevant departments before it can be used.

city.description: The city for which to retrieve usage statistics.

name: get_list_of_active_cities
description: Retrieve a list of all cities where the Magnetic Levitation Grid is active.
